entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 1.
